meanings.definition: In a way that lasts or remains unchanged indefinitely.
meanings.sent1: The sticker was permanently stuck to the wall.
meanings.sent2: She decided to permanently dye her hair blue.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it could permanently hide behind the curtain.
meanings.sent4: His words were permanently etched in her memory.
meanings.sent5: The old clock was permanently frozen at midnight.

meanings.definition: In a way that is not subject to change or reversal.
meanings.sent1: The decision to move was made permanently.
meanings.sent2: The contract was signed permanently, with no way out.
meanings.sent3: The joke was permanently funny, no matter how many times he heard it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was permanently etched on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The sun permanently set on their relationship.
